title: RITES Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 252 Apprentice Posts
description: The Rail India Technical and Economic Service (RITES) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 252 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Trade Apprentices. The interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma, and ITI candidates can apply for the RITES Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online m...
